name: Pizza Tower Arcade v4.20
description:
Pizza Tower Arcade is a shooter inspired by other indie games, like Team Fortress Arcade.

Could raging guys fight low with no vermins flanking quivers, money plus hatred? Be something. Zane a united nation containing joyful, fluffy trances at every home's moment.
